nmap_ip_geolocation_ipapi_script: IP geolocation using ipapi script for a specific country
nmap_ip_geolocation_ipapi_script_desc: Replace <country_code> with a two-letter country code (e.g., pl, cz, sk, hu, de, fr, gb, it, es, ru, us, ca, au, jp, cn, in, br, etc.). Example: nmap --script=ip-geolocation-ipapi-pl 192.168.1.1. See the Nmap documentation for the full list of supported country codes.
